SummaryEnglish: The World Welfare Works Association helps member systems of the United Galactica federation to address various problems on a planetary scale for profit, by dispatching agents called Trouble Consultant. A team of problem consultants from said section, named Kei and Yuri, who have a reputation for leaving traces of destruction behind them, are publicly known as the "Dirty Pair".

1.TitleEnglish: Prison Uprising! We Hate People With Grudges!
1.SummaryEnglish: Kei and Yuri go to a facility located on a violent windstormed planet in an attempt to rescue a hardened warden from a bunch of prisoners who have overtaken the facility.

2.TitleEnglish: Count Us Out! Ultimate Halloween Party
2.SummaryEnglish: The city celebrates Halloween with a large-scale cosplay, but the two girls can't celebrate as the 3WA has assigned them to capture a runaway android that resembles The Terminator. They must do so within the hour or something bad will happen. Meanwhile, some of the local criminals organize some heists

3.TitleEnglish: We're Not Afraid of Divine Judgement! It's Like Magic?! The God's Challenge
3.SummaryEnglish: Kei and Yuri go undercover on a world that is run by a planet-wide religion to investigate a corporate town site that was been devastated by a supposedly divine being. Yuri discovers the secret to how the deity is able to demonstrate his divine powers while Kei gets upset that the god keeps killing off her potential boyfriends.

4.TitleEnglish: Who Care If They're Only Kids! Playing War Games Warrants a Firing Squad?!
4.SummaryEnglish: A military base has been taken over by a group of kids. Kei and Yuri are assigned the task of stopping the kids but without harming them as they are the sons and daughters of various high-ranking officials and leaders. The kids think this is all fun and games as they fight off the girls, but when they accidentally activate a super-powerful weapon, the military decides to authorize the use of deadly force. It will be up to Kei and Yuri to save the day.

5.TitleEnglish: And So, Nobody's Doing It Anymore
5.SummaryEnglish: Kei and Yuri go to a space casino facility to recover one of the top 3WA agents who has fallen into a deep gambling habit. They find the guy at a high-stakes game called Meteor, which involves shooting meteor rocks around a planet and placing bets as to where it will land. Kei dresses up as a participant while Yuri searches the facility for clues as to how the game is rigged.

6.TitleEnglish: Are You Serious?! Shocked at the Beach - Wedding Panic!
6.SummaryEnglish: Kei and Yuri visit an island whose prosperity is built mainly upon a family's counterfeiting operation. Yuri poses as an archeology student but is befriended by a handsome guy, while Kei gets to apply her skills in another not so romantic job. Yuri almost gets into trouble when she is caught snooping around on the church grounds, but the guy bails her out, and they fall in love, and suddenly they're getting married! The 3WA gang is flown in for the wedding, but Kei is still suspicious, and so are the family's members.

7.TitleEnglish: Revenge of the Muscle Lady! Is a Woman's Spirit the Beauty of the Ring?
7.SummaryEnglish: Kei and Yuri go into the underworld of cage fighting to track down a former 3WA trainee named Sandra who is linked to a performance enhancing drug called Hustle (Hard Muscle) that's been sweeping the sport.

8.TitleEnglish: This Girl Is My Elder! Sleeping Beauty
8.SummaryEnglish: Some terrorists attack a space station. A man puts his daughter into a capsule to escape. Kei and Yuri find her escape pod but she hasn't aged a bit in twenty years because the capsule is a cold sleep one. As the only witness to the incident, the girl is put under the supervision of Kei and Yuri as they try to unravel her past and what she remembers from the incident. But not everyone is keen on having secrets revealed.

9.TitleEnglish: Red Eyes are the Sign of Hell! Chase After the Killing Squad!
9.SummaryEnglish: A longtime war is nearing its end when a squad of five red eyed soldiers disrupts the peace process, destroying everyone. Kei and Yuri go to a town to investigate, and after convincing the locals they aren't government officials, they manage to get a ride to the site where they find one of the five soldiers is injured, and learn the secret behind who's behind the operation.

10.TitleEnglish: Evil Speaks For Itself! Space Truckers
10.SummaryEnglish: The space trucks from an independent shipping company have been attacked recently, and with the Universal Corporation taking over operations, many of the truckers are dejected. Kei and Yuri go undercover and join the trucking staff for the shipping company and travel with two truckers who are still willing to face adversity.

11.SummaryEnglish: A little girl has gone missing, but this particular damsel in distress has incredible psychic powers. If Kei and Yuri want to find her, they'll have to fight their way through a deadly forest of illusions...

12.SummaryEnglish: After stopping a group of Vizorium smugglers, Kei and Yuri, the Lovely Angels (more commonly known as the Dirty Pair), are sent on a mission to Agerna, a planet rich with Vizorium, a mineral necessary for space travel. They are sent to stop the mysterious attacks on mining operations that have the governments of the world pointing fingers and blaming each other. While the pair bathe, Carson D. Carson, a former member of the group of smugglers they stopped on their last mission, interrupts their baths by falling through a vent. While Kei and Yuri get out of the bathtubs and question Carson, they are attacked by strange alien monsters that force the Angels to flee, leaving their equipment behind and wearing nothing but towels.

13.SummaryEnglish: The 3WA's Central Computer gave the Dirty Pair two cases at once! Kei and Yuri must investigate a space liner explosion and, at the same time, find a missing scientist. It all seems harmless enough, but this is actually the Angels' most dangerous mission, yet - and if they're not careful, it'll be their last.

1.SummaryEnglish: Eleanor City's landmark tower "Damocles Tower". The self-sustaining main computer that manages it rebelled against humans. Being sown by fire and water, they are attacked by a group of mechas who lose control and run away, and the inhabitants just run away. Among such people, Kay and Yuri of WWWA's trouble consultant "Lovely Angel" appeared ...

2.TitleEnglish: Do Lovely Angels Prefer Chest Hair?
2.SummaryEnglish: Kei and Yuri investigate sabotage on the maiden voyage of a luxury space liner, with an older man who may or may not have chest hair.

3.TitleEnglish: Go Ahead, Fall in Love! Love Is Russian Roulette
3.SummaryEnglish: The Dirty Pair must retrieve a gambling chip stolen from a museum.

4.TitleEnglish: The Chase Smells Like Cheesecake and Death
4.SummaryEnglish: The Dirty Pair investigate the disappearance of a cat from the Bio-Genetics Lab.

5.SummaryEnglish: Kei and Yuri are beleaguered and then abducted by an abandoned space station created by a mad scientist, and only little robot Nammo can save them.

6.TitleEnglish: Lots of Danger, Lots of Decoys
6.SummaryEnglish: Kei and Yuri must defend a precious stone prism shipment against pirates.

7.TitleEnglish: Love Is Everything, Risk Your Life to Elope!!
7.SummaryEnglish: The heir to a travel empire elopes on his wedding day, but his new love tries to extort a ransom from his father. A variety of plot twists ensue.

8.TitleEnglish: Gotta Do It!! Love Is What Makes a Woman Explode
8.SummaryEnglish: Yuri's childhood sweetheart contacts her, but he may be in trouble.

9.TitleEnglish: Hire Us! Beautiful Bodyguards are a Better Deal
9.SummaryEnglish: Kei and Yuri are stranded on a Wild West themed frontier planet and run into the local protection racket, which they offer to protect.

10.SummaryEnglish: The Dirty Pair go to planet Caspia to ensure the security of the young royal successor and prevent the throne being usurped by a wicked uncle.

11.TitleEnglish: Ha Ha Ha, Dresses And Men Should Always Be Brand New
11.SummaryEnglish: The Dirty Pair have a week off and are invited to a party, but are mistaken for fugitives when they go shopping for dresses.

12.TitleEnglish: The Little Dictator! Let Sleeping Top Secrets Lie
12.SummaryEnglish: 3WA headquarters is sealed off following the theft of an R&D security system, and suffers a rodent infestation.

13.TitleEnglish: What's This! My Supple Skin Is a Mess
13.SummaryEnglish: Dangerous acid-spewing life forms have taken over the sewage facility.

14.TitleEnglish: The Vault or the Vote? A Murderous Day For a Speech
14.SummaryEnglish: A presidential candidate is targeted for having his past erased, and it's time for annual maintenance of the Pandora's Box security system.

15.TitleEnglish: Dig Here, Meow Meow - Happiness Comes at the End
15.SummaryEnglish: The Dirty Pair meet an old cowboy who takes them treasure hunting.

16.TitleEnglish: Leave It To Us! The WWWA Is a Wonderful Job
16.SummaryEnglish: Kei and Yuri are hired to escort the naive teenage chairman of an important company who wants to see the city, but lose her at the first opportunity.

17.SummaryEnglish: 3WA's best agent has been assassinated, and the Dirty Pair must find out which of the passengers on a spaceflight is the perpetrator.

18.TitleEnglish: Pardon Us! Trouble's On the Run, So We're Coming Through!
18.SummaryEnglish: The Dirty Pair arrest a difficult character, but getting him to the police station is even more complicated.

19.TitleEnglish: An Unjustified Lover's Grudge. Let Me Love You Without Revenge
19.SummaryEnglish: Kei and Yuri are sent to avenge the "murder" of an eccentric millionaire's romantic interest, a doll. It's going to be tricky though as they already know who dropped a space pod on the doll's head.

20.TitleEnglish: Nostalgic Blues. Make a Killer Soundtrack
20.SummaryEnglish: The Dirty Pair are looking for an assassin who has gone to ground. Unfortunately they end up owing him a favour.

21.SummaryEnglish: A passenger spaceship on a routine flight arrives in port with nobody aboard.

22.SummaryEnglish: Arthur admits his part in the disappearance mystery, but his plan has been hijacked by the pilots to their own ends.

23.SummaryEnglish: Yuri is injured when the 3WA pull them off a drugs job at the last moment, but is helped by a charming con man.

24.TitleEnglish: Are You Serious? A Condo is a Dangerous Place to Live
24.SummaryEnglish: A door-to-door salesman serial killer is on the loose, and the Dirty Pair are assigned to be a honeypot to catch him.

25.TitleEnglish: Eek! The Boy in the Manor is a Terminator
25.SummaryEnglish: Yuri is on a date, so when a job comes up Kei has to partner with Calico to intercept a counterfeiter.

26.TitleEnglish: R-Really!? For Beautiful Women, 'Canon' is the Keyword to Escape
26.SummaryEnglish: Chief Gooley inspects the 3WA Weapons Lab, but Marcus has taken over and executed everyone. Gooley is taken hostage and the city is held to ransom with Marcus's God Cannon.
